name: Butterfly Pea Milk Tea (Blue Milk Tea)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat water in a small saucepan over medium heat until it reaches a rolling boil. Add butterfly pea flowers to the boiling water and steep for 2 minutes until the water turns blue.
